alert.note: Alert for Lower Kuskokwim Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 15 at 12:19PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM AKDT TUESDAY ALONG THE KUSKOKWIM RIVER FROM NAPAIMUTE TO CHUATHBALUK... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...Kuskokwim River from Napaimute to Chuathbaluk. * WHEN...Until 945 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding is being observed along the Kuskokwim River in Napaimute and downstream to Chuathbaluk. Water will remain high until the ice jam releases. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At Noon AKDT, The Riverwatch team reports an ice jam starting at Chuathbaluk to just downstream of Napaimute. The ice jam is currently stationary. Impounding water due to the ice jam will cause rapid river rises upstream of the jam. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
